title: Cardanica (A Steampunk Nightmare)
description: "Now that I've read Cardanica, I won't be taking any elevators."Roberto Grassilli"Not since Harlan Ellison's 'I Have no mouth and I must scream' has there been a better depiction of man at the mercy of his own vindictive and sadistic creations."Paul Di FilippoA steampunk story set in a poisonous world where huge trucks the size of ships plow across the treacherous sands. The “Robredo” is a giant ship-truck, the darling of the local engineering world. Built of metal and wood, it’s powered by a “magic mix” of steam and bacteria …ABOUT THE AUTHOR Tolkien (1989) Lovecraft (1994, 1999), Italia (1989, 1992, 2000)
author: Dario Tonani
